clue: Of all sets I am definitely unique.
I am a subset of every set.
My cardinal number is zero and I am the identity for union of sets.
Remember empty barrels make the most noise. Who am I?
So far as diagrams are concerned, I am quite famous.
I am used to solve problems.
I am used to represent sets, elements and subsets. Who am I?
We are generally a pair of sets.
If we were human, we will never see eye to eye.
Put simply we have nothing in common.
I am in a way a meeting of minds.
I combine two sets and normally produce a smaller set.
I am where two curves meet.
I am a collection of common elements of two or more sets.
